hadiths.text: Narrated Talq ibn Ali al-Hanafi: We came to the Prophet (ﷺ), and a man came and said: Prophet of Allah, what do you say if one prays in a single garment? The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) then took off his wrapper and combined it with his sheet, and put it on them. He got up and the Prophet of Allah (ﷺ) led us in prayer. When he finished the prayer, he said: Does every one of you have two garments?

chapter.ara-name: باب جِمَاعِ أَثْوَابِ مَا يُصَلَّى فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Types Of Clothes In Which It Is Permissible To Pray
